**As a** customer
 **I need** to add items to the cart
 **So that** I can buy items from the webshop
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * purchasing works
 * the cart can update
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given the customer adds items
 When they click on "add"
 Then the cart updates with one new item
 ```
